"use client"; import { AnimatePresence, motion, type Transition } from "motion/react"; import { memo, useState } from "react"; import { Button } from "@/registry/default/ui/button"; type WalletIllustrationProps = { className?: string; circleColors?: [string, string, string, string]; currentStep: number; }; type AnimatedEllipseProps = { cx: string; cy: string; rx: string; ry: string; transform: string; fill: string; filter: string; }; const AnimatedEllipse = memo(({ ...props }: AnimatedEllipseProps) => ( )); const WalletIllustration = memo( ({ className = "", circleColors = ["#5B48AD", "#DC1FFF", "#00FFA3", "#FECA1A"], currentStep, }: WalletIllustrationProps) => { const springTransition: Transition = Object.freeze({ type: "spring", stiffness: 150, damping: 19, mass: 1.2, }); const getStepName = (step: number): "step1" | "step2" | "step3" => { if (step === 0) { return "step1"; } if (step === 1) { return "step2"; } return "step3"; }; const getBtcStepName = ( step: number ): "btcStep0" | "btcStep1" | "hidden" => { if (step === 0) { return "btcStep0"; } if (step === 1) { return "btcStep1"; } return "hidden"; }; const getEthStepName = ( step: number ): "ethStep0" | "ethStep1" | "hidden" => { if (step === 0) { return "ethStep0"; } if (step === 1) { return "ethStep1"; } return "hidden"; }; const getSolStepName = ( step: number ): "solStep0" | "solStep1" | "hidden" => { if (step === 0) { return "solStep0"; } if (step === 1) { return "solStep1"; } return "hidden"; }; const svgVariants = { initial: { y: 50, rotate: -20, scale: 0, }, step1: { y: 0, rotate: 20, scale: 1, transition: { springTransition, }, }, step2: { y: -44, x: -115, rotate: 360, scale: 0.2, transition: { springTransition, }, }, step3: { y: 0, x: 0, rotate: 0, scale: 0.6, transition: { ...springTransition, }, }, }; const containerVariants = { hidden: {}, visible: { transition: { staggerChildren: 0.1, delayChildren: 0.2, }, }, }; const circleVariants = { visible: { scale: 1, opacity: 1, x: 0 }, hidden: { scale: 0, opacity: 0, x: -100 }, }; const backgroundVariants = { hidden: { opacity: 0, scale: 0.8 }, visible: { opacity: 1, scale: 1, transition: { ...springTransition } }, step3: { opacity: 1, scale: 1, transition: { ...springTransition } }, }; const tokenVariants = { hidden: { scale: 0, opacity: 0, x: -100 }, btcStep0: { x: 10, y: -120, scale: 0.8, rotate: -5, opacity: 1, transition: { springTransition, delay: 0.2 }, }, btcStep1: { x: -150, y: -22, scale: 0.23, rotate: -13, opacity: 1, transition: { springTransition }, }, ethStep0: { x: 48, y: 27, scale: 0.7, rotate: 0, opacity: 1, transition: { springTransition, delay: 0.3 }, }, ethStep1: { x: -150, y: 10, scale: 0.23, rotate: 0, opacity: 1, transition: { springTransition }, }, solStep0: { x: -150, y: -30, scale: 0.6, rotate: -15, opacity: 1, transition: { springTransition, delay: 0.4 }, }, solStep1: { x: -150, y: 42, scale: 0.23, rotate: 0, opacity: 1, transition: { springTransition }, }, }; const textVariants = { hidden: { opacity: 0, y: 50 }, visible: { opacity: 1, y: 0, transition: { springTransition }, }, }; return (

); } ); const steps = [ { title: "What is a Wallet?", content: "Wallets allow you to store, receive, send and interact with digital assets like NFTs and tokens in web applications.", }, { title: "Security and Ease of Use", content: "With blockchain applications, your wallet is used as a secure and easy way to connect and interact with web applications.", }, { title: "Decentralized and Permissionless", content: "An essential tool for using blockchain without permission. Wallets allow you to explore and participate in the new web.", }, ]; type WalletOnboardingProps = { onClose: () => void; }; function WalletOnboarding({ onClose }: WalletOnboardingProps) { const [currentStep, setCurrentStep] = useState(0); const goToNext = () => { setCurrentStep((prev) => Math.min(prev + 1, steps.length - 1)); }; const goToPrev = () => { setCurrentStep((prev) => Math.max(prev - 1, 0)); }; return (

); } export { WalletOnboarding };
